title: Moero Arthur: Hakuba no Ouji
synopsis: Moero Arthur Hakuba no Oji is an anime based on the Arthurian legend and it is a sequel to the earlier series Entaku no Kishi Monogatari: Moero Arthur. This time Arthur conceals his true identity in order to defeat Ziking as he and his four new companions begin a journey of adventures.
staff: [['Mizuki, Ichirou', ['Theme Song Performance']], ["Koorogi '73", ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Columbia Yurikago Kai', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Oosugi, Kumiko', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
